name: Ragnaros
title: The Firelord
description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

abilities.name: Empower Sulfuras
abilities.description: Ragnaros's next Basic Attack is instant, dealing 191 Ability damage in an area, and heals for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing doubled versus Heroes. Molten Core: Molten Swing Stun and damage nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Living Meteor
abilities.description: Vector Targeting Summon a meteor at the target point that deals 68 damage, then rolls in the target direction dealing 272 damage per second for 1.75 seconds. Molten Core: Meteor Shower Drop a line of meteor impacts.

abilities.name: Blast Wave
abilities.description: Ignite Ragnaros or an ally, granting 25% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds before exploding dealing 104 damage to nearby enemies. Molten Core: Explosive Rune Cause a delayed explosion in a large area.

heroics.name: Sulfuras Smash
heroics.description: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 198 damage. Enemies in the center take 594 damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.

heroics.name: Lava Wave
heroics.description: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

original.name: Ragnaros
original.title: The Firelord
original.description: As the lord of Azeroth’s fire elementals, Ragnaros desires nothing more than to burn the world to ash. Banished to the Firelands eons ago, the Firelord now turns his rage toward the Nexus, intent on incinerating everything and everyone within it.
original.shortDescription: A Bruiser that can nullify enemy pushes against his Forts and Keeps.

baseHeroInfo.name: Ragnaros
baseHeroInfo.title: The Firelord
baseHeroInfo.description: As the lord of Azeroth’s fire elementals, Ragnaros desires nothing more than to burn the world to ash. Banished to the Firelands eons ago, the Firelord now turns his rage toward the Nexus, intent on incinerating everything and everyone within it.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Bruiser that can nullify enemy pushes against his Forts and Keeps.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

trait.name: Molten Core
trait.description: Channel on an allied or destroyed Fort or Keep to replace it with Ragnaros's ultimate form, temporarily gaining new Abilities, having 3996 Health that burns away over 18 seconds. Ragnaros returns to his normal form upon losing all Health in Molten Core.

skins.name: The Firelord
skins.description: As the lord of Azeroth’s fire elementals, Ragnaros desires nothing more than to burn the world to ash. Banished to the Firelands eons ago, the Firelord now turns his rage toward the Nexus, intent on incinerating everything and everyone within it.

skins.name: Sulfuron Ragnaros
skins.description: Ragnaros is at his strongest within the smoldering halls of Sulfuron Keep. Adorned in the primal metals that comprise his seat of power, he now carries that strength with him at all times.

skins.name: Lil' Ragnaros
skins.description: YOU FOOL! WHAT DID I SAY ABOUT SUMMONING ME TOO SOON? I DESPISE BEING ADORABLE!
